    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class core.Main
    The main method that starts the Processing sketch.
    Main - Class in core
    The main entry point class that launches the stock prediction and simulation application using Processing.
    Main() - Constructor for class core.Main
     
    MAIN_MENU_SCREEN - Variable in class ui.DrawingSurface
     
    MainMenuScreen - Class in ui
    The MainMenuScreen class represents the main menu of the Stock Analyzer application with enhanced UI: stock-themed background image, animated gradient overlay, hover scaling, pill-shaped buttons, and emojis.
    MainMenuScreen(DrawingSurface) - Constructor for class ui.MainMenuScreen
    Constructs a MainMenuScreen with specified drawing surface.
    MarketSimulator - Class in simulation
    The MarketSimulator class is a concrete subclass of Simulator that simulates stock market behavior on a broader scale, encompassing market-wide trends and events.
    MarketSimulator() - Constructor for class simulation.MarketSimulator
